casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 8, 2010

[Cite as 02108/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-388.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1405. Cincinnati School Dist. Bd. of Edn. v. Hamilton Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2007-A-1196. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to reschedule oral argument before a master commissioner set for Wednesday, March 17, 2010,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
